SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BatchInsertBuilder
A builder class for SQLBatchInsert instances.
BeanifierFactory<T>
A factory for ResultSetBeanifier instances.
BeanValueProcessor<T>
Used to selectively modify values within a list of JavaBeans or records.
BindInfo
BindInfo objects allow you to determine how values are bound into a PreparedStatement.
DatabaseException
A RuntimeException that may either wrap a SQLException or indicate another error condition while processing or executing SQL.
InsertBuilder
A Builder class for SQLInsert instances.
MappifierFactory
A factory for ResultSetMappifier instances.
Quoter
Escapes and quotes values according to the quoting rules of the target database.
ResultSetBeanifier<T>
Converts the rows in a JDBC ResultSet into JavaBeans or records.
ResultSetMappifier
Converts the rows in a JDBC ResultSet into Map<String, Object> pseudo-objects.
SQL
Encapsulates a user-provided SQL statement.
SQLBatchInsert<T>
SQLBatchInsert specializes in saving large batches of JavaBeans or records to the database.
SQLExpression
A special string wrapper object whose type signals to Klojang JDBC that the wrapped string must be treated as a native SQL expression and hence must not be escaped or quoted.
SQLInsert
Facilitates the execution of SQL INSERT statements.
SQLQuery
Facilitates the execution of SQL SELECT statements.
SQLSession
An SQLSession allows you to provide values for template variables within an SQL template.
SQLStatement<T>
Abstract base class for SQLQuery, SQLInsert and SQLUpdate.
SQLUpdate
Facilitates the execution of UPDATE, DELETE, and DDL statements.
